title: Shin Reyon Densetsu: Mou Hitori no Flair

alternative_titles.ja: 新リヨン伝説　もう一人のフレア

synopsis:
An evil entity named Ternel has returned after being sealed away for 300 years, and she intends to continue to inflict suffering as well as unworldly pleasures on mankind. However, her plans are being threatened by the powerful Baron Zeke, the beautiful Neris and a spunky girl called Flair.

(Source: AniDB)
